articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Lao President
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Lao President
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a reply message from Bounnang Vorachith, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, on Monday.
					 The message says:
					
					 I, on behalf of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the government and people of the Lao People's Democratic Republic and on my own behalf, express heartfelt thanks to you for extending warm congratulations and best wishes to the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the Lao government and people and me on the occasion of the 42nd anniversary of the founding of the Lao People's Democratic Republic.
					
					 We reaffirm once again the traditional friendship and solidarity between the two parties, two states and two peoples.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I wish you good health and success in your noble work.

articles.title: Osandok Prize Sports Contest Closes
articles.content:
Osandok Prize Sports Contest Closes
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The Osandok Prize Sports Contest, which was opened to mark the 100th birth anniversary of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk, closed with due ceremony at the Ice Rink on Thursday.
					 Attending the ceremony were Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Sports Guidance Committee, and officials concerned.
					
					 The Taesongsan Sports Team came top in the team standings.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony there was a demonstration of figure skaters who proved successful in the contest.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the missions of UNDP, UNICEF, United Nations Population Fund, FAO, WFP and WHO here visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Thursday on the occasion of the New Year Juche 107 (2018).
					 They paid tribute to the great leaders after presenting floral baskets before their statues.

articles.title: Valuable Sci-tech Achievements Made in 2017
articles.content:
Valuable Sci-tech Achievements Made in 2017
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- A number of sci-tech achievements which are of the state's significance have been made in the DPRK this year.
					 Sci-tech achievements made by the State Academy of Sciences are making great contribution to putting national economy on a Juche, modern and self-supporting basis.
					
					 The Institute of Automation introduced into practice the PLC special functional module and motor regulating valve needed for establishing the integrated production system at thermal power plants and automatic system at mines, while the Manufactory No. 111 and the IT Sci-tech Institute completed integrated circuit for metering and measuring and various kinds of industrial IT products.
					
					 The Bioengineering Branch registered such latest research achievements as breeding of highly productive fishes and development of a technology of cultivating fruit sapling based on tissue culture.
					
					 The Mechanical Engineering Institute developed PMMA intra ocular lens process equipment and decanter centrifuge, the Environmental Engineering Institute metal cutting machine using hydrogen and the Control Machine Institute new-type CNC device.
					
					 The Hydraulic Engineering Institute, the Electricity Institute, etc. completed tidal generating installations and generating system of water supply and drainage in downtown areas.
					
					 The Microbiological Research Institute laid foundations for producing red yeast in an industrial method.
					
					 Besides, oxygen-pulverized coal firing technology, heat-resisting cement, generator excitation, speed regulator control system and combined water control system were introduced into thermal power plants and hydro-power stations across the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Foiling Challenge of Conservative Group in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Foiling Challenge of Conservative Group in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- A lesson drawn by the south Koreans while looking back on the year of vicissitude is that they have to wage an unflinching struggle under the uplifted banner of the abolition of evils and conservatism until the rubbish of history is wiped out, defying the desperate challenge of the puppet conservative forces, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 This year traitor Park Geun Hye was impeached and ousted from office, being charged with hideous crimes by massive candle-light resistance of the people enraged at the traitorous rule of the conservative regime, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The south Koreans' delight was just a moment.
					
					 Even though traitor Park was thrown into prison, the remnants of conservatives still stalk, viciously challenging the candlelight mind-set and going desperate to get out of the abyss of destruction.
					
					 Therefore, the south Koreans' struggle for new politics and new life has faced great difficulties and the wish of the candlelight demonstrators has not yet been realized.
					
					 The puppet conservative group, which was obliged to face justice as accomplices of traitor Park, is making frontal challenge to the abolition of evils. This is directly related to the unequivocal attitude of the present south Korean authorities.
					
					 Should the reactionaries of history are left intact, the gains won by the south Koreans at the cost of blood can be brought to naught.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns S. Korean Forces against Escalating Racket for Stifling DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns S. Korean Forces against Escalating Racket for Stifling DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces went busy for the manipulation of new anti-DPRK "sanctions resolution" at the UN Security Council. No sooner had the "resolution" been published than they expressed "support and welcome" and described it as the "sanctions resolution for dismantlement of nuclear program". They have also gone so shameless as to call for "acknowledging the meaning of sanctions", "stopping provocation" and "coming out for the dialogue for nuclear dismantlement at an early date". They even disclosed their dirty intention to escalate sanctions and pressure on the DPRK while crying out for "thorough-going implementation of the sanctions resolution" through close cooperation with the international community.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday brands this as a ridiculous fit of imbeciles so ignorant as not to be able to discern the trend of the times.
					
					 The new "sanctions resolution" manipulated by the forces hostile toward the DPRK will only make its army and people put into practice their will to settle accounts with the U.S., the will which has been hardened decade after decade, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet forces going helter-skelter, in pursuance of the U.S. criminal moves for putting sanctions and pressure on the DPRK, should clearly understand that the destination of their traitorous act is the escalation of tension, war and their death.
					
					 We will never tolerate the provocation of the puppet forces bringing the holocaust of a nuclear war while escalating confrontation and tension in collusion with the U.S., but counter them with resolute actions.

articles.title: U.S. Is Cancer-like Entity on Planet: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Is Cancer-like Entity on Planet: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The U.S. exercised the veto right in voting on resolution of the UN Security Council against the Trump administration's decision of acknowledging Kuds as capital of Israel.
					 The U.S. Defense Department is calling for dispatching its marines to Arab and Islamic countries for the security of the U.S. embassies there over the Kuds issue.
					
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Thursday dismisses this as the height of the U.S. imperialists' Yankee-style arrogance as they go impudent even though they trample on the desire and wish of the world people for regional peace and stability.
					
					 It says:
					
					 The U.S., hideous harasser of peace, bringing the holocaust of new war to the Mid-east and the world is disqualified to talk about the international peace and security.
					
					 All the UN member nations including non-aligned nations keenly realize the need for the reform of the UN Security Council under the tragic situation in which the UN is crudely lynched by the high-handed and arbitrary practices of one member nation the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. trying to lord it over the UN and the world is the cancer-like entity on the planet.
					
					 The arrogant imperialism can not escape international isolation and denunciation.
					
					 Firm is the support and solidarity of the Korean people with the just cause of Arab people including the Palestinians to win their legitimate rights.

articles.title: Withdrawal of U.S. Forces in S. Korea Demanded
articles.content:
Withdrawal of U.S. Forces in S. Korea Demanded
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The Measure Committee for Properly Retaking U.S. military base in Ryongsan and the Inhabitants Association for Properly Retaking U.S. Military Base in Ryongsan held a meeting in Ryongsan District, Seoul on Dec. 23 in demand of the withdrawal of the U.S. imperialist aggressors forces from south Korea, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Sibo.
					 The participants urged the U.S. imperialist aggressors forces to clear the Ryongsan base of pollutants and return it.
					
					 A poem denouncing Trump, an old lunatic bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean peninsula while trumpeting about not ruling out a war, was recited to boost the morale of the participants.
					
					 The participants pledged to wage unceasing actions until the environmental pollution is properly settled and the base is properly returned.

articles.title: Adoption of Law for Investigation into Irregularities Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Adoption of Law for Investigation into Irregularities Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The Joint Action for Pressing for Establishment of Office for Investigation into Corruption of Public Officials in south Korea launched a struggle in Seoul on Dec. 18 to call for the adoption of a law for the investigation into corruptions and irregularities committed by the puppet public officials, according to the south Korean online paper Voice of Seoul.
					 The Joint Action is made up of various organizations including the Bar Association for Democratic Society and the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society.
					
					 The organization waged demonstration outside the "National Assembly", the building of "Liberal Korea Party" and the "government" building and in Kwanghwamun Plaza on December 22.
					
					 The demonstrators clarified that more than 80 percent of the population support the establishment of the office.
					
					 However, the "National Assembly" in December failed to discuss the relevant bill, they charged.
					
					 The LKP wasted away precious time by declining the examination of the bill, they held.
					
					 They stressed the need for the NA passage of the bill for the establishment of the office for investigation.

articles.title: U.S. Experiment of Biochemical Weapons Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Experiment of Biochemical Weapons Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The Phyongthaek Citizens' Action against THAAD and Anthrax Germs in south Korea, which comprises civic and religious organizations in Phyongthae of Kyonggi Province, held a press conference on December 26 in protest against the U.S. experiment of biochemical weapons, according to Voice of People, a south Korean internet newspaper.
					 Noting that the recent disclosure of the U.S. attempt at experimenting biochemical weapons in its Phyongthaek military base has touched off indignation of the citizens, the speakers urged the authorities to properly size up the situation, and demand the withdrawal of Jupiter Plan which threatens life and security of citizens in breach of international law.
					
					 Phyongthaek can never be reduced to the lab for U.S. biochemical weapons, they said, firmly pledging to check the U.S. military's unilateral press for Jupiter Plan.

articles.title: Brief Biography of Kim Jong Il Introduced by Czech Body
articles.content:
Brief Biography of Kim Jong Il Introduced by Czech Body
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association posted on its website the brief biography of leader Kim Jong Il with his portrait on Dec. 17, the sixth anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Commemorated in Russia
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Commemorated in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Various events were held by political parties, organizations and institutions of Russia from Dec. 11 to 23 to commemorate the sixth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display at their venues were photos showing the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also their works and books and photos introducing the achievements made by the Korean army and people in building a powerful socialist nation.
					
					 The chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia said that the DPRK could glorify its dignity as an invincible country thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The head of the Russia-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group of the State Duma stated that Kim Jong Il made a great contribution to development of the Russia-DPRK relations.
					
					 The first secretary of the Amur Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that Kim Jong Il is the peerlessly great man as he gave perfect answers to all the problems arising in carrying out the socialist cause through his energetic ideo-theoretical activities.
					
					 The first secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of the Soviet Union said that the DPRK will remain unfazed and surely emerge victorious under the guidance of Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward the cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The first secretary of the All-Russia Lenin Young Communist League noted that the world could know better about Kim Jong Il's noble moral sense of obligation through his visit to the mausoleum of Lenin.
					
					 Messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held under the sponsorship of the Russian Committee for Remembering the Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il and the All-Russia Lenin Young Communist League.

articles.title: Career and Feats of Kim Jong Il Lauded by Syrian Media
articles.content:
Career and Feats of Kim Jong Il Lauded by Syrian Media
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Syrian media gave special write-ups to the sixth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il from Dec. 14 to 17.
					 The Syrian Arab News Agency reported about the ideo-theoretical feats of Kim Jong Il and his Songun revolutionary exploits, carrying his photo.
					
					 The Syria TV Channel aired the achievements made by the Korean army and people in the building of a powerful socialist nation and the standoff with the U.S. as well as photos showing the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Syrian Radio Broadcasting Service aired a special report about the precious revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Syrian paper Al Baath said the whole life of Kim Jong Il was that of towering flame and 2011, the last year of his life, was a year in which he had devotedly worked for the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people with his superhuman energy.
					
					 The newspaper Al Thawrah said that Kim Jong Il had always given priority to the future of the country in adopting any line and policy and dealing with any problem during the whole period of his guidance over the country and the people.
					
					 Another paper Tishrin said the great life of Kim Jong Il was associated with his mission of taking responsibility for the destiny of the people, sense of obligation for providing the people with happiness and sincerest and warmest love for the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta de Bounnang Vorachith
articles.content:
Entidad rusa rechaza nueva "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC 
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En una declaracion fechada 25, el Grupo de Estudio de la Idea Juche de Moscu de Rusia denuncio la "resolucion de sancion" No. 2397 del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU contra el lanzamiento exitoso de prueba del ICBM tipo "Hwasong-15" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					La nota revela que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU volvio a fabricar la "resolucion de sancion" contra la Corea socialista. 
					
					Continua que los imperialistas se desesperan para exterminar completamente a la RPDC, Estado socialista donde el pueblo se hace dueno, pero en vano. 
					
					Afirma que el pueblo coreano, unido compactamente en torno al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un y al Partido del Trabajo de Corea, defendera sin falta el socialismo conquistado a precio de la sangre y sudor. 
					
					Manifiesta el apoyo total a la justa lucha del pueblo coreano y concluye que todos los miembros de la entidad rusa denuncian fuertemente la "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad, inventada a fin de aplastar a la Corea socialista.

articles.title: Clausurada Competencia Deportiva por Premio Osandok
articles.content:
Exitos logrados este ano en la reconstruccion del distrito de Samjiyon
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Se impulsa a buen ritmo en Corea el remozamiento del distrito de Samjiyon, tierra historica donde estan grabadas las proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung acumuladas en la guerra antijaponesa y nacio el Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Estrella Luz del Paektu.
					De acuerdo con un funcionario interesado, los comandantes y brigadistas de construccion de la Division 216, los constructores de los ministerios, organos centrales y comites populares en diversas provincias y los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea llevaron adelante esa obra superando este ano multiples pruebas y dificultades con el espiritu de autoconfianza y autofortalecimiento.
					
					Los funcionarios, cientificos e investigadores de la Direccion de Materiales Historico-Revolucionarios, la Universidad Kim Il Sung, el instituto de conservacion de los lugares de interes historico-revolucionario de la filial de Hamhung de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, el Instituto de Decoracion Luminica Songyong y otras unidades dedicaron toda su inteligencia y pasion para conservar en el nivel supremo la estatua de bronce del Presidente a la orilla del lago Samji y otra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en la cabecera distrital de Samjiyon.
					
					Terminaron la obra de conservacion de varias isbas, inclusive la casa natal del Dirigente en el campamento secreto del monte Paektu, y las labores para proteger desde el incendio los arboles con consignas revolucionarias inscritas.
					
					A pesar de desfavorables condiciones climaticas del lago Chon del monte Paektu, los uniformados del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea repararon con exito las escaleras de piedra del lago y terminaron con antelacion la formacion exterior de mas de 10 establecimientos, inclusive las estaciones ferroviarias Hyangdo y Paektu y la estacion de teleferico.
					
					Gracias a los meritos heroicos de los constructores, esta a punto de inauguracion la obra de ferrovia ancha Hyesan-Samjiyon al finalizarse la construccion de la via y estructuras ferroviarias y modernas estaciones como la Juventud de Samjiyon y la del lago Samji.
					
					Fueron remodeladas magnificamente la sala de estudio de Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo, el hotel en la cabecera distrital y la tienda combinada en el distrito de Samjiyon.
					
					Termino la edificacion de armadura del Museo General del Monte Paektu que dara amplios conocimientos sobre las proezas revolucionarias de los grandes hombres sin pares y la historia y naturaleza de ese monte.
					
					Se construyo en un corto plazo la Fabrica de Harina de Patata de Samjiyon que tiene la capacidad de produccion anual de 4 mil toneladas. Esta planta esta compuesta por varios edificios modernos de gran capacidad de produccion, el deposito de papas de 20 mil toneladas, los edificios auxiliares y el albergue de los obreros.
					
					Los constructores, cientificos e investigadores instalaron en la cima del pico Pegae los paneles fotovoltaicos de 100kw y en el tejado del mismo los generadores eolicos posibilitando asi la capacidad de generacion electrica total de 400kw.
					
					Se ha completado la infraestructura de comunicaciones al extenderse los cables de fibra optica y se han inventado los materiales de acabado de construccion hechos con recursos abundantes en la localidad.
					
					Ahora, se construyen mucho mas viviendas haciendo uso de las experiencias con que se habia construido las existentes en la cabecera distrital.
					
					Dentro de algunos anos, Samjiyon se transformara en un museo al aire libre para la educacion en las tradiciones revolucionarias, el distrito ejemplar de la zona montanosa, lugar con la industria local mas desarrollada, la unidad ejemplar de cultivo de patatas y el prototipo de la mecanizacion universal de agricultura.
